definition: to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: What if last night God destroyed my soul and put in a new soul?
sentences.chinese: 如果昨晚上帝毀掉了我的靈魂並創造了新的那怎麼辦？

sentences.english: What year was it destroyed on Halloween?
sentences.chinese: 它是哪一年的萬聖節前夜被毀掉的？

sentences.english: Whole life blown away in the brink of eye.
sentences.chinese: 你的一生在轉眼之間就毀掉了。

sentences.english: By 1525, the authorities ordered that all oceangoing vessels be destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 1525年，中國下令毀掉所有遠洋船隻。

sentences.english: The two tried to share air, but panic took hold of the out-of-air diver.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人分享氧氣，但是驚慌毀掉了缺氧潛水者。

sentences.english: She poured water over my painting and ruined it.
sentences.chinese: 她把水澆在我的畫上，將畫毀掉了。

sentences.english: From time to time they pull down much-loved old buildings to make room for new plants.
sentences.chinese: 他們常常毀掉一些人們喜愛的老建築物來蓋新廠房。

sentences.english: They say this will cause global problems that will destroy the world.
sentences.chinese: 他們稱這會導致全球性的問題，從而毀掉整個世界。

sentences.english: That museum was also destroyed, and a salvage effort is under way there as well.
sentences.chinese: 這座博物館也被毀掉了，目前那裏也在進行搶救行動。

sentences.english: Many pundits say that these two problems are enough to sink his chances.
sentences.chinese: 許多學者認爲這兩大問題足以毀掉他的機會。

sentences.english: Like, basically ruining your chance to do that.
sentences.chinese: 就基本上，毀掉你帶球跑的機會。

sentences.english: They stressed that we must destroy the spirit of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 一定要毀掉他們強調過的刻苦耐勞精神。

sentences.english: Now that these facilities have been trashed, it's absolutely devastating.
sentences.chinese: 看看現在，這些設施都被毀掉了，這絕對是破壞。

sentences.english: Already 4 million trees have been felled or marked for destruction.
sentences.chinese: 已經有4百萬棵樹被砍伐或是標記要毀掉的。

sentences.english: Our nation will not be undone by terror.
sentences.chinese: 我們的國家不會被恐怖行動毀掉。

sentences.english: The demon of greed ruined the miser's happiness.
sentences.chinese: 貪得無厭的惡習毀掉了那個守財奴的幸福。
